data.oai_dc:dc: Data frame for survival relative to group size, 11 columns: A = animal ID, B = year, C = group size, including all animals, D = group size, adult females only, E = survival outcome, F = age at time X, G = age at time X+1, H = number of adult female reltiaves (r > 0.063) at timeX, I = number of adult female reltiaves (r > 0.125) at timeX, J = number of adult female reltiaves (r > 0.25) at timeX, K = number of adult female reltiaves (r =0.5 ) at timeX,
